Title: Topical treatments for vernal keratoconjunctivitis
Abstract: © 2017 The Cochrane Collaboration. Published by John Wiley & Sons, Ltd.This is a protocol for a Cochrane Review (Intervention). The objectives are as follows: To assess the benefits and risks of topical interventions in vernal keratoconjunctivitis.
